resources.string: Occasionally at rest or after a physical effort
More than 20 cigarettes a day and taking birth control pill
Woman with BMI below 24 / Man with BMI below 25
Woman with BMI between 25 - 30 / Man with BMI between 26 -30
At least once - twice a week
Yes, but I don\'t need medication.
I take medicines to reduce blood glucose
Answer to all the questions to see your personal evaluation, thanks!
Have you ever had an heart attack or a coronary bypass surgery?
Are you a smoker? How many cigarettes do you smoke a day?
Have your parents, siblings or children had an heart attack or stroke?
Do you work every day in stressful conditions?
Do you know your total cholesterol and \"good\" high-density lipoprotein (HDL) cholesterol levels?
Do you know your blood pressure measurements?
How many times are you engaged in physical activity (at least 20 minutes at a time)?
Do you often eat fruits and vegetables in a typical day? Base your answers on your eating habits last month.
Do you often eat saturated (animal) fats each day? (For example hamburger, steak, bacon, ham, sausage, butter, whole milk, ice cream, cheese).
Body mass index (BMI) is a measure of body fat based on height and weight that applies to adult men and women. You\'ll see your BMI in the final evaluation.
Have you ever had chest tightness at least once for more than 5 minutes?
Have you sometimes had, during exercise or in common cold, sudden severe pain in the chest, whether or not radiating to the neck or to the arm?
Your risk of cardiovascular disease is medium. Try to reduce the risk factors related with your lifestyle.
Congratulations! Your risk of cardiovascular disease is low. Go on taking care of your lifestyle.
Your risk of cardiovascular disease is really high. Check with your doctor as soon as possible to reduce your heart attack risk. It\'s strongly recommended for you to have a healthy lifestyle.
Your risk of cardiovascular disease is high. Check with your doctor to reduce all the risk factors and improve your lifestyle.
Heart Disease Risk test inspired by Deutsche Herzstiftung studies, under the scientific supervision of Prof. Dr. med. Helmut Gohlke, Head of Clinic Cardiology at Herz-Zentrum Bad Krozingen.
Is your blood glucose level high?
You\'ve checked too many boxes for sex in BMI calculation. Please check only one box, thanks!
Evaluation of your personal heart disease risk
